email_text:
Dear valued Amazon customer,

We are writing to inform you that there is an issue with the payment method linked to your Amazon account. In order to continue enjoying uninterrupted service and to prevent any disruptions to your orders, we kindly ask you to update your credit card details as soon as possible.

To update your payment information, please click on the link below and follow the instructions provided:

[Insert phishing link here]

Please note that failing to update your payment information may result in the suspension of your account and delays in processing your orders. We value your business and want to ensure that you have a seamless shopping experience on Amazon.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
Amazon Customer Service Team
